alert.note: Alert for Hartford (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:46PM EDT until May 16 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR HARTFORD...SOUTHWESTERN HAMPSHIRE AND WESTERN HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 546 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Hartford Center, or 7 miles northeast of Torrington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Bristol, Manchester, East Hartford, Enfield, Southington, Westfield, Glastonbury, Newington, Windsor, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Wethersfield, South Windsor, Farmington, Simsbury and Bloomfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
